ygData.subject: Re: /auc Looking to buy a clue
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well this isn t surprising in light of the recent information we ve found out from the Shaman s alchemy. Verant is willing to ignore 100 s of bug reports
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Dec 08/99, James Schuldes <jgs@...> wrote:
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> The words: "I will take a look at this" are missing. I don't get the
> feeling that GZ recognizes it as a bug. My read is that he is brushing it
> off as 'anecdotal evidence' and one player's opinion rather than accepting
> the possibility of a bug or unintentional change.

Well this isn't surprising in light of the recent information we've
found out from the Shaman's alchemy. Verant is willing to ignore 100's
of bug reports and feedback regarding alchemy being broken rather than
go take a look at their (later) admitted badly designed test procedure.

As we know bards get no testing at all, what hope do we have of getting
this fixed or even looked at.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
